title: Brigadeiro
method: Step 2: Combine condensed milk, cocoa, and butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until thickened, about 10 minutes.
Step 3: Transfer mixture into a shallow bowl and allow to cool.
Step 4: Pinch off some of the dough and roll into a small ball; place on a plate. Repeat with remaining mixture, then roll each brigadeiro in chocolate sprinkles.
Step 5: Enjoy or chill brigadeiros until ready to serve.
